title: Enhancing Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Research-Based Professional Development Program for Online Teaching

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of online education principles and instructional experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Participants can design and apply at least three effective interaction strategies in online learning environments
Participants can select digital assessment tools aligned with language education objectives to establish project-based evaluation plans
Participants can produce a one-week online lecture module using a content development framework suitable for blended instruction models
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
